original_text: And thou shalt bring Aaron and his sons unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and wash them with water.
korean_text: 너는 또 아론과 그 아들들을 회막 문으로 데려다가 물로 씻기고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt bring Aaron and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 아론과 그의 아들들을 데려와야 하며

sentences.original_text: unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
